sermons.title: From Whence Come Wars and Fightings Among You?
sermons.description: The essence of sin is self, the big "I". Fightings and wars come from knowing God has said "No," and yet taking that which He has forbidden, because I think that I am wiser, and I want what is forbidden. People at war with themselves tend to be at war with others. Unconditional surrender is the only way to complete victory.
